website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, Birkenstocks are still quality sandals that are made to last with comfort in mind, and this pair is no exception.
pros: A well-made sandal by an iconic brand that's a great choice if you love an easy-to-wear, casual look
Features leather straps and contoured foot bed that cradles the foot
cons: A bit stiff initially, but tends to become more flexible after the break in period
May run somewhat wide for some wearers
On the higher end of the price scale

customer_reviews.title: Breaking them in is tough but worth it
customer_reviews.text: These sandals hurt my feet so bad at first. My feet would be aching to the point where I’d have foot cramps as soon as I took them off and I would have to sit down. However.... now that they are broken in... I love them! The sole contoured to the shape of my foot. The straps are adjustable. If you are accustomed to wearing cheapo flip flops/sandals from Target/Walmart, you will have an adjustment period. But all in all, I feel safer wearing these sturdy sandals. I got them muddy by accident, so I let them soak in a bucket of warm water and they cleaned up just like new. They seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy glue job and footbed already coming apart!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to gift these to my husband but upon opening it was just total disappointment. I've never seen poor quality from Birkenstock and I'm seriously in awe this even happened. It looks as if it came apart and was glued back together. I ordered a pair for myself with the same shipment and no problem. They were perfect but this pair. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't have believed a shoe could take away the pain of plantar fasciitis by just putting it on, but this Birkenstock did.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several brands to try to rid myself of the pain of plantar fasciitis, but this is the first that did it by just putting it on. I love that the straps are adjustable, too, and that their is great arch support as I have high arches. The deep heel cup and the toe grip make them very easy to wear all day and walk in everywhere I need to go. I will probably buy more Birkenstocks as my legs and feet continue to heal.
customer_reviews.author: Tru2My Style

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First pair of birks. Took 3 weeks to fully feel comfortable as expected. After a few months of wear, I am very disappointed in how they are wearing. The straps are separating from the footbed, the sole is very run down and overall they just look very tattered and beat. Around the edges of the top footbed layer and cork where it is glued together is separating in multiple places. To be honest, they aren’t comfortable for long walks. I spend a day in the city and a few hours in, I was regretting wearing these. Very disappointed in the price I paid. I’ve had knockoffs last longer and look better for 1/3 of the price. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, light and socially acceptable (at least according to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to ditch my Keenes because my kids said they would not be seen in public with me if I continued to wear them. These took some getting used to. At first I thought they were too small, but your foot is gently molded into the sole the more you wear them. Took them to the beach and that was a mistake. Sand got caught beneath the leather bands and chewed through the top of my foot. Now I wear these as I would shoes. They are comfortable, light and socially acceptable (at least according to my grown children).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and used.
customer_reviews.text: Damaged and used- I am very unhappy with the purchase. The box they came in seemd old, not just beat up from transit, but like it had been opened and closed many times. The shoes looked lightly worn, although they were supposed to be new. They had toe marks on the footbed. There was some fading on the straps too. Also, parts of the soft footbed were missing, so there are some black spots. Then it looked as though clear glue surrounded the edges. My guess is they had a used pair and tried to repair the footbed and resell it as new. Definitely got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: These are FAKE and they will not accept a return. They fit larger than the size they are marked and are rude when communicating with then for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Chloie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Bad Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: The product description for the Navy Birkenstock’s is inaccurate. The description states that the sandals have a leather upper. The upper is not made of leather they are the birken-flor material. The buckles are also plastic, I live in Arizona and plastic buckles are not the best choice for extreme heat. Also, all other Birkenstock’s I have bought come with metal buckles. If I wanted plastic buckles I would have ordered from the Birkenstock Betula line. I must admit the picture and the soft footbed are accurate. However, I usually go off the product description since pictures can be misleading. Obviously, in this case, it was the opposite, the picture was correct and the description was inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: What's In a Name

customer_reviews.title: Boo on this pair!
customer_reviews.text: I am not so pleased with this pair of Birkenstocks. I always wear a 38 N...That's what these said. They are larger, do not have a very good toe grip or arch support, the bottom feels flat, not as sturdy as those I have had in the past. I have been wearing Birkenstocks for 30 years, I wonder if I am running into knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn schneider

customer_reviews.title: A rip off
customer_reviews.text: Terrible shoe. My daughter wore them only a couple times and the black sole has separated from the shoe. You're wasting your money with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Birkenstocks for years since my podiatrist recommended them. They are the most comfortable shoes I own. I wear them indoors and out. (They aren't good for wet weather, however.) This is my first pair of black ones and they look a little classier with my jeans than the originals. I knew what size to buy since it was a repeat purchase, but I think the sizes seem like they are going to be too big, but aren't. I normally wear a 7 1/2 m women's shoe and I take a 38 Birkenstock. It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 Size Too Big
customer_reviews.text: It’s tough if you wear 1/2 sizes. I wear a 5.5 US, tried 35 and it was too small. Then bought a 36, but it’s a little too big, however I decided to keep because it’s better than too tight. It’s taking some time to get used to, but I still have hope because they’ve helped alleviate my knee pain. The insole helped me realize where I should adjust my weight to distribute it evenly, which helped with the pain. I just wish it was a tighter fit, without being too snug. With socks, they fit perfectly. Hence the half size haha
customer_reviews.author: JoAce

customer_reviews.title: Returning these MENS sandals!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered, it said "Birkenstock Women's Arizona Birko-Flo Mocca Sandals ", but we received Men's sandals. They didn't fit - way too wide and long. Will be returning them tomorrow. Instead of messing around trying to reorder (not knowing what we might get), I just ordered from the Birkenstock website. At this point it's worth a few extra $'s to know what I'm getting and not have to work so hard reordering and dealing with the potential for more returns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe these are back in style!
customer_reviews.text: First off these are universal European sizing. I normally wear a 8 1/2 to a 9 in men’s so a 41 fits great. I actually went to a department store to figure out my size then bought these online. They fit great, feel great, look great.. no complaints. They definitely mold to your foot so the longer you wear them the better they feel. Great throwback look!
customer_reviews.author: JKinGA

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever, after break in period
customer_reviews.text: As always, it takes a few days to break in new Berks, but after wearing them for an hour on day 1, 3 on day 2 and 3, I was able to wear them all day long on day 4 without pain! I haven’t had a pair in a long time (I left my first pair in the sun- don’t do that) and I had forgotten how much I loved them!! Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My feet thank me
customer_reviews.text: I have the foam Birkenstock sandals and love going to the pool and beach with them. So I bought these as more of my street sandals. I'm in love! And my feet already feel great - well supported. At first, the arch feels a bit high to walk on but after a couple of wears, I can't imagine wearing anything else. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Quite good for an Online buy
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I would not want to buy Birkenstocks without trying them out. However, these were very reasonably priced, have great arch support and are a reasonably good fit considering you can personalize the 2 straps to your feet. My left foot is a little less comfortable in fit than my right - but that’s obviously an anomaly in my foot, and not in the shoe. I do wish it had been available with black straps.
customer_reviews.author: bbbass1

customer_reviews.title: First time with Birks, most comfortable shoe ever and reversed my fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were too big at first, but they actually fit perfect after a week of wearing them in. This was my first pair and it’s cured my fasciitis (heal pain!) in no time. Now I never wear anything else unless I absolutely have to!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock still continues with quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort of the formed foot bed. NOTE: Many Birkenstock size/color options are in a dropdown from the main posting. The main posting description is: Birkenstock Unisex Sydney Soft Footbed Sandal. From this dropdown, I purchased the Women's Arizona in mocca from Birko-Flor Sandals 39.0 EU N, which ARE NOT the SOFT FOOTBED. The price may be an indication. I'm happy with either, but, if you require the SFB or Soft FootBed, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Swell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description, not leather or sfb Birkenstock’s.
customer_reviews.text: These were supposed to be the soft foot bed and they definitely are not as I have a pair of milanos in the soft foot bed. The description says soft sfb and leather. These are definitely not leather either and didn’t even come in a box..... please edit your description of the product as it’s inaccurate. These are very obviously the birkibruc and regular “hard” footbed.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Sent men's shoes instead of women's.  Not a happy wife here
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty easy to see sizes on Birkenstock shoes. Men's shoes have an M then a number for example. If you order women's shoes it will have a W then a number. If your order women's shoes and see and M then a number you know it is not going to turn out well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Comfy Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I am a sucker for Birkenstocks and this pair turned out great. Fits just right and I know they will last for years. I'll wear this pair as indoor Birkenstocks. They are much better than commercial slippers since they are comfortable and will hold up for years. I have several designated for outdoor wear too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Lois

customer_reviews.title: What I got was not "Soft Footbed"
customer_reviews.text: I received the item but it is definitely NOT soft footbed; otherwise it would specifically and unmistakably indicate "Soft Footbed" on the insole. They either made a mistake in the shipment or the website description is inaccurate. Go to the Birkenstock website and you'll see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Ramone

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and love the baby blue color!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to get the narrow width. Works great and sandals don't feel loose. I have had to wear them a little bit more (just a couple days) to "break them in" than I do normally for Birkenstocks. Just not used to the wider straps but now they are great! Love them like all the other ones I have and great color!
customer_reviews.author: westtexaskat

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them and didn’t like them for the first few days but I convinced him to just give them a chance and he loves them now. He has a hard time walking with other footwear but these help him a lot he was very suprized. However briks take some time to break in just be patient and you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi G.

customer_reviews.title: READ THE ITEM DESCRIPTION AND DOUBLE CHECK!
customer_reviews.text: NOT A LEATHER UPPER! Use caution when ordering Birkenstocks from Amazon!!! Read the item description very carefully and know what you are actually ordering by referring to the Birkenstock website. These are listed as natural leather with suede lining THESE ARE NOT LEATHER. The quality is still good and they are about $10 cheaper than the Birkenstock website but when your intention is to buy leather it is disappointing. Giving 5 stars for the item, but would give it ONE star for item description of I could.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Prater

customer_reviews.title: Still unique, still special
customer_reviews.text: I wear Birkenstock sandals around the house and have had a pair for about 23 years. I decided I needed a new pair, but the prices had gone up tremendously from the mid-1990s. I opted for the mid-price shoe, and realizing that it is not the same quality as what I had before, I am still satisfied with my new sandals and think they will last several years.
customer_reviews.author: D.R. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter gift
customer_reviews.text: She loved this gift and is still wearing them a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Susie B

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I've had Birkenstocks before but this is my first pair of Arizona's. I thought the wide straps would be so constricting but they really are comfortable. What's really comfortable is the soft foot bed. I wasn't really paying attention to that when I ordered them but I'll never buy a regular foot bed again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These did not fit me like the past ones I've purchased over the years. They came packaged in a plastic bag with no tags. I'm wondering where they actually came from. I've never purchased a pair on Amazon that didn't come in a box. Truly disappointed but will try to break in to see if I can wear them. I hate returning things, so I will be more cautious next time I buy shoes on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: PKlady

customer_reviews.title: Two of the best purchases I have made this year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these, one for my wife and one for my daughter. My wife has plantar fasciitis and tells me that these are very helpful in relieving the pain she has from that. My daughter’s team mates all wear these and she loves them as well.
customer_reviews.author: alfisch

customer_reviews.title: These sandal run very large!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen how popular these sandals are and wanted a pair. My girlfriend had some and said they really run large, so I normally wear a size 7 so ordered a size 6. They are still too long and too wide even after tightening the straps, so consequently when I have worn them my foot does not ride securely in the footbed. Really disappointed in them. Other than that being a problem, they are well made and if they fit would be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Birks! Through my own mistake, I intially ordered too large of a shoe but exchanged for the right size. I'm a woman who wears a size 9 shoe and ordered a 7 under the men's size or a 40 under the European chart size. The fit is great and it offers support in all the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Birks r the BEST hands  down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ALWAYS loved Birks! The only issue was my own mistake. I ordered one size too lg. So all I Really wanted to do was change them to a different size but I didn’t see an option to be able to do that so I’ll wait for my refund and buy them again in the right size this time, I mean I’m not about to spend nearly 100$ on sandals that I could’ve kept and worn but wouldn’t have been happy with that decision, therefore I wait! LOL but five stars definitely
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie p.

customer_reviews.title: Meh. You can do better.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Cute, trendy, sure. The copper scuffed pretty badly right out of the box. If I could turn back time, I wouldn't have bought them. I would've bought a more classic pair that doesn't scuff as badly and that won't go out of style next year. I always wish Birkenstocks were as cute in person as they are online. Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Original suede covered hard sole are the best, and can even be hand washed
customer_reviews.text: Got what I wanted and expected, with the original FIRM, not cushioned foot-bed. But something is still not right with the descriptions on Amazon, which at the top and bottom of the same page describe the foot-bed differently! Confusing but I took a chance and it worked out! Original suede covered hard sole are the best, and can even be hand washed, carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Magana

customer_reviews.title: Check your size
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with purchase. This is my 6th pair of Birkenstocks. I don’t know whether my feet have changed or grown over the years but I read the size chart and how the sandals are supposed to fit... I ended up ordering a size larger but in narrow fit both because they are unisex and my foot is rather narrow. They fit perfect. The stone color is great and complimentary neutral. I “broke them in” for 5 days around the house before traveling to NYC and comfortably walked 23 miles over 4 days without any foot/ leg/ back pain!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I put that headline because I've read that often times when Birkenstocks are ordered from a non-Birkenstock distributor, they're not the real thing. These are and are exactly what I expected. They arrived on time, fit well and I'm enjoying having a pair of Birkenstocks again-very comfortable to me!
customer_reviews.author: ElaineS

customer_reviews.title: I love my Birks
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about them. The only thing is that the left sandal is a bit wider than the right. I have a narrow foot and would prefer a tighter fit, even when I adjust the buckle. Overall, I know they'll last a long time and its a good buy. The color is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice just need to break them in
customer_reviews.text: I agree with another reviewer. Made my feet hurt the next day but I think because they're new and need to be broken in. I'm only a size 5. Small feet and slight arch. After day 3 of using them the pain has gone away. But my feet hurt the next day badly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best you could do is wear Birkenstock
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing you can do for yourself Happy feet your back your well-being the comfort is fantastic I have about 20 pair all colors all styles The service is excellent very pleased arrived on time good company will buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Milagros Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: So dang comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are crazy comfortable! I purchased in a 39- I am a solid 9 usually. According to the size chart on Amazon I should have purchased a 40, but I went and got fitted at a birkenstock specialty store and they said I was a 39. A lot of reviewers on Amazon also recommend purchasing a narrow if you have a normal width foot, but the birk pros told me that birkinstocks are DESIGNED to fit a bit wider and looser, and that's the way they should be worn-- no if you have a narrow foot order a narrow-- if you have a medium width foot order a medium. Hope this review helps others.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes- leather stretches a bit, so may be wide for some.
customer_reviews.text: These Birkenstocks are your standard suede/leather ones, and they are great quality- Made in Germany- and the color is perfect and neutral. The only problem is that the suede stretches quite easily, and my daughter had to make a new notch to keep the shoe fitting (and she has a wide-ish foot), so I would say they run a bit wide and about right for a 39; however, if you are more of an 8 than an 8-1/2, they would be a bit big, I think. We got these for a good price, and I would recommend them, just knowing that they might run wide (or stretch wide).
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable lounge socks
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of these socks, and I mostly use them for around the house or casual wear. They run large, and are v loose, soft and slouchy so i would not wear them hiking - but for every day chill out wear, I love the way that they feel. They are very well made, and wash/dry well. I love that they are natural fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a pair of Arizona sandals from years ago that he loves. Ordered him a new pair. Old ones were a size 41 but according to the chart his size should be 43. I thought sizing might have changed and compromised and got him size 42. That was too large and returned and ordered him a 41 which is a perfect fit for his size 10 + foot. No idea why the small size should fit his 10+ foot. Glad Amazon has a good return policy. The birkenstocks a little expensive for us but he loves them and they last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I am a women and got these narrow Birkenstocks that said mens. They fit great and are so comfortable. Love the sky blue color. Also ordered Birkenstock care kit to keep them protected and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Raymond

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: You just can't go wrong with Birks. They are fairly spendy, but so worth it! I am tougher on my shoes and these completely hold up! I wore these to both Disney and through downtown Chicago all day. Never made my feet sore and felt so supported! Last forever, and I can say, I don't take the best care of shoes :)
customer_reviews.author: Tunlyn

customer_reviews.title: Crocks for Comfort is Better
customer_reviews.text: I understand you have to break them in to have them form to your feet. However, still uncomfortable, I would recommend Crocks for comfort if that is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal Birkenstocks!
customer_reviews.text: These are real Birks. I was nervous to get them because there are a ton of fakes on amazon, but these are real and I love them. They are going to be so comfy when I wear them in. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are now very comfortable! At first, I was worried that they were going to hurt my feet, but finally they are conforming to the shape of my foot. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: TinaBina

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I'd own a pair...
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would own a pair of these shoes. When I first saw them as a small child I thought they were hideous, just like the Teva sandals. However I have spent the last year traveling around the world and have needed some good walking shoes. My friend recommended I buy a pair and I finally splurged. They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned once you break them in. Their appearance has also grown on me; I may end up buying another Birkenstock product in a different design!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Hideously Uncomfortable, Suspected Cheap Knock-Offs, Not Genuine Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: I have always lived in my GENUINE Birkenstock Arizonas, they are the most comfortable shoes. THIS pair is hideously uncomfortable, the footbed indentations are in the wrong places and they bruise my feet. I suspect these are cheap knock-offs, genuine Birkies Arizona shoes always git me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Felis librarius

customer_reviews.title: Doubt they are the real thing but OK
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and fit well but I don’t think they are original Birkenstock’s Color was as describei hope they are as sturdy and comfortable as the originals
customer_reviews.author: mxa70

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my personal use. I overpronate. They were painful to walk in. My wife attempting to use them and she thought they were very uncomfortable. I returned them
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock shoes take too long to be  comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My personal physician recommended these shoes. I was told they would be uncomfortable at first. I am still trying to break them in so they are comfortable to wear ,most of the day. Not yet. I will continue trying for 30 days and if they still hurt my feet I will decide if I will return them.. It's alot of money to pay for shoes I cannot wear.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Narrow works for regular size as well.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love the color! The “narrow” size is about the same as the regular size, and if it’s your only option go for it because you can loosen the straps! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My husband does not wear any other shoe in the summer. He is really hard on shoes and these Birkenstocks hold up better than any other shoe he has tried.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Lambeth

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Bought for my wife and daughter and both love the way the look and fill on their feet. Would defiantly purchase again.. Very pleased. Regular width fit my daughters normally considered wide foot so unless the person has a really wide foot a regular may work for them.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Check label to make sure they're not narrow...
customer_reviews.text: Slight rubbing on the side of my foot. On closer examination of the box, the sticker said narrow in small print, and I ordered medium width. I've already worn them for two weeks so I will make it work. Just buyer beware when you get your box.
customer_reviews.author: Pursuing Him

customer_reviews.title: I did get the Birkenstock Birkbuc on sale so it made a nice present for a relative that wears a size shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish that there was a standard size for Birkenstock. The Birkbuc was too big, and I've had others from Birkenstock that were too small so I never know which Birkenstock collection will fit just right. I did get the Birkenstock Birkbuc on sale so it made a nice present for a relative that wears a size shoe larger than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Fitts

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of some of the negative reviews but these are actually really nice. Light weight, comfortable and really cute! They have a little bit of a break in time but I just wear them here and there. After the first day wearing them while sitting I could already feel them forming to my feet. Definitely worth the purchase. If you have more narrow feet or prefer a more narrow toe box o would try to find the color in narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying Birks and I should have done it a long time ago. I suffer from plantar fasciitis and these have already reduced my pain after wearing them for 2 days. The arch is great and the material is perfect. Yes they are expensive but you cannot put a price on happy feet!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Husband's first Birki's
customer_reviews.text: My husband was having foot and heel pain and I immediately started looking for a pair of Birkenstocks, having trusted this brand to coddle my feet and provide proper support for years. I found a size 14(!) on Amazon and ordered from their vendor. Fast service, the order was accurate, my husband won't take the shoes off, everybody's happy!
customer_reviews.author: G. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock makes a great sandal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought directly from Birkenstock.com to get a smaller size and in suede. Save these for wearing with thick socks in the winter. "Regular" width means C or D.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Graham

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were great quality and exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were great quality and exactly as described. I order a size smaller than I wear in other shoes and they were still slightly too large. I was unable to wear the shoes because they hurt my foot where I had had major foot surgery a couple of years ago. I so wanted to be able to wear them but they just didn't work for me. The shoes are somewhat stiff at first but my daughter has a pair and after wearing them a few times they become comfortable and it's a shoe she wears all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Ouchie
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable when I wear them. But I always end up with blisters on the inside of my feet. I made sure to adjust them just right. I'm taking these to Goodwill store tomorrow. Maybe someone else will have better luck with them
customer_reviews.author: nan_c77

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The soft footbed of these sandals make them a dream to walk in. I wear them as long as I can, and with socks in the winter indoors
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Kristan

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved Birkenstocks. These came super fast and as expected. The color is a little lighter than I thought it would be but still overall love them. It is great that the straps tighten and loosen depending on how someone likes them to fit. I just received these but all my other pairs have lasted multiple years. They somewhat mold to your feet and toes so they slide right into place every time you put them on. Love the comfort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about Birkenstock's. This is my 6th pair. I have worn them for years. Like them way better than flip flops. Easy to just slip into, especially when I get pedicures.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Rock

customer_reviews.title: Love love love them !
customer_reviews.text: Normally buy $20 shoes but due to a lot of foot problems I needed something better for my feet. Also I never realized a shoes could be so solid and supportive you can really feel the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary & Erin Rohman

customer_reviews.title: God For Loafing
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Berks. At first they kept falling off and I thought they were too small. I kept wearing then around the yard for a few weekends and they started breaking in. Seems the cork like platform will eventually mold to your foot. I wouldn't go to far in these yet but the're good for loafing around.
customer_reviews.author: Vilhjálmur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sandle for everyone
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a comfortable sandle then these are perfect, and the fit your feet like a glove with space to move about.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Really hard cork foot bed
customer_reviews.text: The cork bottom hurt my feet. I wore these to a high school band concert and just walking in the school and walking out to my car, my feet were aching. I'd rather thand on concrete barefoot. The sides rubbed blisters on my feet too.
customer_reviews.author: Bella A.

customer_reviews.title: the worst shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: they were scratched in one wear and my daughter's feet kept getting blisters from them. Love Birkenstock and this was our 6th pair and was not happy.
customer_reviews.author: lorialb

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair, but this is the first pair I have bought off Amazon. They are my second most comfortable and best fitting pair. Birkenstock’s might be my new favorite sandal.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: A1 Comfort, Fit, Quality
customer_reviews.text: Based on the advertisement pics I couldn’t be too sure of the color of the slides. One pic made them appear green and the other tan. Was hesitant to order but decided to take a gamble. They’re definitely a shade of green which was my preference. I wear a size 7 and ordered the 38 which fit perfectly. Super comfy and the best thing to throw on when headed to that pedi appointment!!
customer_reviews.author: MikaElaine

customer_reviews.title: Love Birks!  They fit a little wide.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 4th pair of Birkenstocks. I love the support they provide. I normally buy a 11-11.5 D in a shoe. Originally I ordered a 44 M. I found them to be a little wide. I found that ordering narrow 44 N, fit my foot like a glove. The Birkenstock website lists the widths as a narrow being B-C width and M being D-2E width, but if you find your feet to be average width, you may want to go with narrow.
customer_reviews.author: D. Temple

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the others and go one size down
customer_reviews.text: Definitely listen to the other reviews and go one size down on these. I got a pair for my daughter on her birthday and I'm glad I listened to the other reviewers. They fit absolutely perfectly. She loves them and I'm happy to see her so excited about sandals that were the rage when I was in high school lol!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis N.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I was worried they would be knock-offs, but they’re authentic and wonderful. Supportive and stylish. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Love berks but I think this company snuck one by me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Narrow. The box was not narrow but there was a sticker off to the side that said narrow. I don’t believe these were narrow fit because I’ve had narrow berks before and didn’t have to nail in extra holes. I didn’t return because I felt like it would’ve been a hassle. I just made my own extra holes but it would’ve been nice to get exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gottsch

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Though a tad pricey, after wearing these a few days I cannot say enough good things about them
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Koperdak

customer_reviews.title: Arizona Soft foot bed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Arizona SFB but received the original Arizona with the original foot bed. I will still keep the product because I love the Arizona style Birkenstock. Buyer beware when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: true crime lover

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: The size difference between the 37m and 37n is enormous!! The n size are more narrow, straps shorter, shoes lighter in weight but they feel cheap too. I’m returning and would rather have 37m.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The Ugly Shoes You Can't Live Without
customer_reviews.text: I ripped a ligament in my forefoot; non-weightbearing for 6 wks; boot for 6 wks. I now can wear either hiking boots ( so sexy ) or tightly laced tennis shoes. The Birkenstocks keep my foot from splaying and allows the ligament to heal. The shoe has good arch support and stiff footpad. I use it at home when I can't stand tennis shoes anymore; especially in the heat here in the West. All I know is my foot is finally healing, but REALLY slow going, and doesn't hurt when I walk in the birkenstocks, versus other sandals. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: East Bay Gal

customer_reviews.title: Quality sandals
customer_reviews.text: Once the break-in period is done, these are absolutely wonderful. I was fearful that they’d send me a fake after reading some reviews, but I’m confident these are the real deal (I had recently purchased Birkenstock at a local store, so I can compare the quality, materials and the box). I’m happy with the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Olga I. Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Not LEATHER false advertising
customer_reviews.text: These ARE NOT LEATHER, although it states it in subtitle and in the description, and I quote “ This is the real deal. Cork, leather, a buckle or two:...” FALSE advertising
customer_reviews.author: lizzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying more. Order from Zappos through Amazon. Literally took a day.
customer_reviews.author: Joyousness

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe ever. Very supportive. Great fit. Would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Peters

customer_reviews.title: I really love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: In US size, I wear 7 EE shoes. I really love these sandals. I have arthritis and wearing the wrong shoe causes extreme pain. I can wear these with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: JulieFromCinci

customer_reviews.title: ... are the only shoe that makes my feet feel better! I was almost to the point of not ...
customer_reviews.text: As a teacher who is on her feet all day I have found that these are the only shoe that makes my feet feel better! I was almost to the point of not being able to walk when I bought my first pair of Birks. I can stand all day and still have strength to go out at night and walk around. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: Product was extremely hard to receive. I had to drive 30 minutes to pick it up. I’m usually a size 7/8 so I ordered 7/7.5 and they were huge on me!! They also didn’t look real. I ended up buying from the store and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sent FOAM Shoes.  What I received were not Birkenstock's!
customer_reviews.text: These looked like something you can buy at the gas station. Please check your vendors before buying blindly as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Toooooo large
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what kind of sizing is used but these berks are 2 sizes larger than my other pair that are the same size. Fortunately they fit a friend who wears a size 2xs larger than me. If the sizing was accurate I would rate 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: April T. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect image associated with the item, a matte silver
customer_reviews.text: The photo of the image is not the product - its pictured is the polished metallic cc which is a different sku altogether - this one is a matte silver, not what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: V.W.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a larger size because they had sold out of my size; however, I found these shoes to be a comfortable fit. So it was definitely a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Golden M. Tradewell

customer_reviews.title: helps my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: The traditional footbed in Birkenstocks takes the pressure off my sore heel. The Arizona is a great shoe to keep handy to wear in the house while my foot is healing. I bought this shoe years ago when they weren't sold "unisex" and the strap holes were punched differently. I have to use the last hole where before I used the second or third hole. If this setting had been any looser I would have had to punch new holes which isn't handy. But other than that it's the same great shoe I've loved for years. The suede is so comfortable and the color goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: I love Birkeys
customer_reviews.text: if you have never owned a pair of Birkenstocks get a pair. They support your feet so well and help to reduce lower back pain. I wear Birkenstock orthotics in my shoes that I wear to work every day and have no back pain even though I work on my feet for about 14 hours a day. I got these Birkenstocks for knocking around the house because they are more comfortable thanany pair of slippers or other sandals that I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: chefmike200

customer_reviews.title: So comfy, the real deal
customer_reviews.text: So I selected Black Leather (the photo with the black buckles) and received Birkenstocks with pewter buckles. Slightly bummed about that as I wear mostly gold but I’m still in love with these shoes and they deserve 5 stars. Definitely the genuine article. Real leather, and super comfortable. For reference I’m a women’s US 7 and a 37 regular width is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been without a pair of these for 27 years! They may seem pricey but so worth it.i wear them everyday in rain or shine and they kick ass!!! You may experience a bit of shin splints for the first day or so but it's normal
customer_reviews.author: dara

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Never have I ever thought I would spend $100 on sandals. But, I am SO glad I did. I absolutely live my Birks and I've definitely gotten my money's worth out of them. Super happy with the adjustable fit and the arch support as well.
customer_reviews.author: TS

product_meta.title: Birkenstock Unisex Arizona SFB
product_meta.description:
Soft suede broadens the popular BIRKENSTOCK classic with new, trendy models. The high-quality, thick suede of the sandals is completely dyed. The colors draw on fresh summer trends. A special detail of the sandals is their white outsole. It emphasizes the clean, muted look of the shoe. The soft and comfortable footbed provides extra comfort.

This is the real deal. Cork, leather, a buckle or two: these are the simple ideas that have made feet happy for over two hundred years, and that's the original Birkenstock. These shoes are made in Germany since 1774. No smoke, no mirrors, and no gizmos are needed. You walk, the shoe molds to your foot. The shape of the Original Birkenstock Footbed enables body weight to be distributed evenly over the whole foot, providing it with optimal support.
